articles.author: HT Tech
articles.title: NASA Astronomy Picture of the Day 4 March 2023: Venus and Jupiter! - HT Tech
articles.description: NASA Astronomy Picture of the Day is a collage of the rare Venus and Jupiter conjunction.
articles.content: In the last couple of weeks, Venus and Jupiter have continued their slow dance in the dark sky. For the past few weeks, the planets have been visible in the early evening skies, shining brightly. On … [+1718 chars]
